subject: Help Need!!! Urgent!I would like to test a method repeatedly with various inputs
msgSnippet: Hi all, I have a method public boolean parse(String param). I wanna test this method repeatedly with variaous types of input in my JUunit class. I have tried
messageBody:
Hi all,

I have a method

public boolean parse(String param).
I wanna test this method repeatedly with variaous types of input in
my JUunit class.
I have tried calling
assertEquals(boolean, o.parset("Hello")) in a loop, but it worked for
only first iteration.

I tried calling the same multiple times then also same problem..

Could anybody tell me how to approach to test multiple times with
various kinds of inputs a single method...

Thanks in advance,
Yellappa
